sections.heading: Appeals
sections.text: to district court, court of appeals and Supreme Court.

sections.heading: Appeal
sections.text: to court of appeals or Supreme Court taken on questions of law alone.

sections.heading: Designation
sections.text: of parties on appeal.

sections.heading: Intermediate
sections.text: order or proceeding may be reviewed on appeal.

sections.heading: Automatic
sections.text:
appeal in certain cases; mandatory review of death sentence by court of appeals

or Supreme Court.

sections.heading: Appeal
sections.text: to court of appeals or Supreme Court: Notice.

sections.heading: Effect
sections.text: of appeal by State.

sections.heading: Stay
sections.text: of execution upon sentence of death.

sections.heading: Stay
sections.text: of execution upon sentence of imprisonment.

sections.heading: Stay
sections.text: of execution upon fine.

sections.heading: Stay
sections.text: of probation.

sections.heading: Admission
sections.text: to bail upon appeal.

sections.heading: Application
sections.text: for relief pending review.

sections.heading: Supervision
sections.text: of appeal.

sections.heading: Preparation
sections.text: of record and papers on appeal.

sections.heading: Dismissal
sections.text: by court of appeals or Supreme Court.

sections.heading: Date
sections.text: for argument.

sections.heading: Judgment
sections.text: may be affirmed but cannot be reversed without argument.

sections.heading: Number
sections.text: of counsel in argument on appeal.

sections.heading: Defendant
sections.text: need not be present.

sections.heading: Court
sections.text: to give judgment without regard to technical errors.

sections.heading: Determination
sections.text: of appeal.

sections.heading: Defendant
sections.text: to be discharged on reversal without ordering new trial.

sections.heading: Judgment
sections.text: to be executed on affirmance.

sections.heading: Jurisdiction
sections.text:
of court of appeals or Supreme Court to cease after certificate of judgment

remitted.

sections.heading: of Article 6
